summary: This bill, the "Preserving Life-saving Access to Specialty Medicines in America Act" (PLASMA Act), amends Title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide a phased-in manufacturer discount for plasma-derived products under the Medicare Part D program. The discount percentage will vary based on the year (2026-2032+) and whether the beneficiary has met their out-of-pocket threshold. Certain drugs dispensed to low-income subsidy (LIS) beneficiaries and those from specified small manufacturers are excluded.
